text.1: Piper Companies is seeking a Green Energy Data Scientist for a growing organization based on the East Coast. The Data Scientist will need to work EST hours and is a fully remote role. The Green Energy Data Scientist will be joining a team building an industry changing product that has had a very successful launch into the market. A successful candidate for the Green Energy Data Scientist role will have a passion in green energy and have an interest in working on object detection technology.

text: Responsibilities for the Green Energy Data Scientist include:

li: Develop, maintain, and execute advanced statistical and machine learning techniques to solve complex data problems and initiatives
li.1: Ensure the models and statistical tests are reusable and modular
li.2: Communicate effectively with technical and non technical audiences

text: Teach and mentor other data scientists on the team
Requirements for the Green Energy Data Scientist include:

li.1: 2+ years of experience in data science, software engineering, analytics, and/or data production
li.2: Demonstratable expertise building and supporting machine learning models deployed to production
li.3: Strong experience programming in Python and/or R
li.4: Object detection experience is a big plus
li.6: Strong verbal and written communication skills and the ability to work with business stakeholders
